1.0.name: wordpress/complete-update-urls
1.0.description:
Complete Update URLs will update your URLs from the current site location to a new site location. Complete Update URLs is a complete update solution that will update all of your urls from your posts, widgets, theme configuration, etc. Forget about ever having to manually edit the database again like you ended up having to do with the other URL update solutions out there. Complete Update URLs is simple and easy.

Support | FAQ

Some benefits:

  • Put in your new url and click one button. Can't get any simpler than that!
  • Full support for serialized and unserialized meta-data. No database editing required!
  • Have an advanced theme that you spent days configuring? Complete Update URLs will update those settings too!
  • Find it difficult to move your Wordpress site? Complete Update URL makes it easy.</
